title.narrative: Promoting the inclusion of the 50+ population group in Fight Against HIV/AIDS in three SADC Countries (Tanzania, Zimbabwe & South Africa)

description.narrative: Promoting the inclusion of the 50+ population group in the fight against HIV and AIDS in three SADC countries (Tanzania, Zimbabwe and South Africa)
To contribute to the generation of evidence and analysis on HIV and AIDS prevalence and access to services
To empower older men and women with appropriate information on HIV and AIDS prevention, access to care and treatment, and treatment adherence through peer support forums | | |
To increase older women and men's access to age friendly health and HIV and AIDS quality services
To mitigate the impact of HIV and AIDS in households headed by older men and women

participating-org.narrative: African Woman's AIDS Working Group (AFRIWAG), Tanz

mailing-address.narrative: Tavis House, 1-6 Tavistock Square, London WC1H 9NA
